pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Testing for Functional Data // Implementation of two sample comparison procedures based on median-based statistical tests for functional data, introduced in Smida et al (2022) doi:10.1080/10485252.2022.2064997. Other competitive state-of- the-art approaches proposed by Chakraborty and Chaudhuri (2015) doi:10.1093/biomet/asu072, Horvath et al (2013) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2012.01032.x or Cuevas et al (2004) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2003.10.021 are also included in the package, as well as procedures to run test result comparisons and power analysis using simulations.
